stimulusHtml: The parametric function f is given by ft=xt,yt, where xt=t2+t+1 and yt=2t for 0≤t≤10. Which of the following is the graph of f ?
choicesHtml:
The x axis ranges from 0 to 120 in increments of 10. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate.

  • The curve has the general shape of a parabola that opens right.
  • The bottom right of the curve begins at (91 comma negative 10).
  • The curve increases from right to left, passing through (21 comma negative 5) and reaching its vertex at (0.85 comma negative 0.5).
  • The curve changes directions, increasing from left to right.
  • The curve passes through (31 comma 5) and ends at (111 comma 10).

 

The x axis ranges from 0 to 120 in increments of 10. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate.

  • The curve has the general shape of the upper portion of a parabola that opens right.
  • The curve begins at (1 comma 0) and increases from left to right.
  • The curve passes through (31 comma 5) and ends at (111 comma 10).

 

The x axis ranges from 0 to 120 in increments of 10. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate.

  • The curve has the general shape of the upper portion of a parabola that opens right.
  • The curve begins at (1 comma 0) and increases from left to right.
  • The curve passes through (31 comma 10) and ends at (111 comma 20).

 

The x axis ranges from 0 to 120 in increments of 10. The y axis ranges from negative 20 to 20 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate.

  • The curve has the general shape of a parabola that opens right.
  • The bottom right of the curve begins at (91 comma negative 20).
  • The curve increases from right to left, passing through (21 comma negative 10) and reaching its vertex at (0.75 comma negative 1).
  • The curve changes directions, increasing from left to right.
  • The curve passes through (31 comma 10) and ends at (111 comma 20).
